title: GGList
description: Pokémon card favorites & rating site using Google OAuth, Cloud SQL, and a full Vite + Node.js stack
highlights: Protected backend API with JWT + rate-limits
Favorites and voting with user-level Postgres data

title: Upload Center
description: A GCP-native file analysis app with JSON upload → BigQuery ingestion → Vertex AI text analysis
highlights: Streaming JSON uploads to Cloud Storage
BigQuery load jobs for dataset analysis

title: Stock AI Analysis
description: A stock ticker + AI sentiment & pattern analyzer built on Cloud Run with WIF GitHub Actions
highlights: Vertex AI reasoning over stock data

title: Nerd by Day, Nerd by Night
description: Brand + merch project with a custom e-commerce stack on GCP

title: Trinity Raiders
description: A card-based roguelike using React 19 + Zustand with a 3-party combat system
highlights: Battle phase, upgrade phase, and persistent state
